name: Parallel Partners
description:
A (Platonic) Dating Sim/Visual Novel with a partner that gets lost in a different world.

Meet their different versions in different dimensions, get to know them, earn their trust and find out why this all happened...

Featuring:

  • 3 different dimensions and partners
  • 3 different art styles
  • 3 endings
  • Capybaras

This game was made in Unity by Propapoma Fohakri for Not a Sailor Studios' first Game Jam! The themes were "Friendship" and/or "Betrayal".
